name: A pair of solid leather boots
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
Thick leather boots allows the wearer to walk through large puddles with ease.
